properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique string of numbers and letters that identifies the Pin on Pinterest.

properties.name: link
properties.description: The URL of the webpage where the Pin was created.

properties.name: url
properties.description: The URL of the Pin on Pinterest.

properties.name: creator
properties.description: The first and last name, ID and profile URL of the user who created the board.

properties.name: board
properties.description: The board that the Pin is on.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: The date the Pin was created.

properties.name: note
properties.description: The user-entered description of the Pin.

properties.name: color
properties.description: The dominant color of the Pin’s image in hex code format.

properties.name: counts
properties.description: The Pin’s stats, including the number of repins, comments and likes.

properties.name: media
properties.description: The media type of the Pin (image or video).

properties.name: attribution
properties.description: The source data for videos, including the title, URL, provider, author name, author URL and provider name.

properties.name: image
properties.description: The Pin’s image. The default response returns the image’s URL, width and height.

properties.name: metadata
properties.description: Extra information about the Pin for Rich Pins. Includes the Pin type (e.g., article, recipe) and related information (e.g., ingredients, author).
